English: Nanhaizi, name used to refer to various places, including `草~`海~[Cao3 hai3], `南苑~[Nan2 yuan4] and the Nanhaizi Wetland in Baotou, Inner Mongolia

d.f: `南苑~，`在~`北平市~`永~`定~`門外~，`乃~`天子~`游獵~`的~`地方~。
`地~`名~。`位於~`綏遠省~`包頭~`之~`南~，`濱~`黃河~，`為~`民船~`停泊~`的~`地方~。

English: Nanhaizi, name used to refer to various places, including `草~`海~[Cao3 hai3], `南苑~[Nan2 yuan4] and the Nanhaizi Wetland in Baotou, Inner Mongolia
